Cable Detector

Author: Bartłomiej Duda

Simple app to detect metal object and wires

Application uses magnetic field sensor and magnitude value to detect objects.

Important! Connected power consumption should be > 200 Watt to detect wires. Move phone slowly for better detection.

There are some limitations of magnetic field sensor like limited range of detection and small sensitivity. Wire detection may not work perfectly!
